tool.name: UPDio
tool.command: ln -s $multisample_vcf input.vcf.gz && updio --multisample_vcf input.vcf.gz --childID $child_id --momID $mom_id --dadID $dad_id && mv output_dir/${child_id}.table ${updio_table} && mv output_dir/${child_id}.upd ${updio_verdict}

param.name: child_id
param.label: child sample ID in the VCF file

param.name: mom_id
param.label: Mother sample ID in the VCF file

param.name: dad_id
param.label: Father sample ID in the VCF file

tool.help: UPDio is designed to detect UPD events in probands from vcf trio data.
